Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can see the stairs to the next level!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'We can get to the roof through here.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks like we're getting closer to the source of danger.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, if I'm not wrong, the Rail Heterozygote up there is releasing more and more Corrupted into the carriages.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is it trying to claim this train as its nest?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's... something I wish to never see again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's take care of them and move on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'll create an opening so you guys can go up to the roof first.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'll catch up with you as soon as I'm done here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'If that thing is right on top of here, then your team is more suitable to deal with it than me.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "...If you require assistance, please let us know immediately. We'll come to your aid once we've ensured Changyu's safety.", 4: '1'}
